text: Is HubSpot working on/testing a new errors features in modules right now, it looks like? Several of my module fields are showing new warning indicators, but not actually saying what the warning is, just says “Contains error.”
indeed it would be helpful if it could be posted below the field listing ( if it is only one error) or open in a popup if there are several
Yeah, I agree it's not clear. I figured out for me it wanted defaults picked for choices like drop downs etc.
